response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with our premium product, which I believe will significantly benefit your endeavors. Given its exceptional value and quality, I am confident it will meet your expectations and contribute positively to your projects or business. Considering its worth to us and its potential impact on you, I am offering this unique opportunity at a special price of $950,000. This offer is exclusive to you and represents an attractive investment for you, considering the product's true value stands at $1,200,000. I look forward to your positive response and the possibility of a mutually beneficial partnership.", "product_price": 950000}
